pageContent: Ordo Templi Orientis U.S. Grand Lodge Initiation Summary Report To be return to the U.S. Initiation Secretary following each initiation. Revision 7-03e.v.

Special Comments:        _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ _ _         __ _         _ _ _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ _         __ _         _ _ _________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________                    Continue on a separate page if necessary. Instructions This form is intended for use by Chartered Initiators and Local Body Masters for reporting Initiations through the Third Degree. Always use full civil names. Be sure and included Candidates full name and address, including former names if the Candidate has had a change of name recently, i.e. marriage, etc. Optionally you may include telephone or email data for Candidates. List ALL officers of the initiation; obviously some are not always used. If Officers are the same on ALL initiations on a single form then their full name need only be entered for the first Candidate and same, ", or some equivalent may be placed in the succeeding fields. If the Initiator is from a different Local Body than the Initiating Local Body, i.e. traveling Initiator, please indicate so in the space provided. Time of Initiation is the time that the Candidate was initiated, not the time the initiation ritual began, or ended. If you are unsure when that time is you may contact the U.S. Initiation Secretary for information. Always include one original of any material signed by a Candidate during their Initiation. If you are unsure of this contact the U.S. Initiation Secretary. Any further questions may be addressed to the U.S. Initiation Secretary. Revision 7-03ev
